snippet.title: GUARDIANS - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Guardians is a multiplayer / co-op rogue-lite survivor game where players work together to build guardians and conquer in a persistent planets. As a guardian mecha droid, you embody the last line of defense against the encroaching darkness. Prepare to unleash your unique powers, wield formidable weapons, and master devastating abilities as you embark on an epic quest to restore balance and vanquish the forces of chaos.

Play Demo GUARDIANS on Steam today:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1312080/Guardians/

Guardians Official Website : https://www.playguardians.games/

Important Links
Official WEBSITE: https://www.born2playgames.com/
B2PG Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@born2play_games
B2PG Twitter: https://twitter.com/born2play_games
B2PG Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/born2play_games/
B2PG Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/Born2PlayGames
